When you want to repay let me know so that I can send you my repayment wallet id.Please do not scam and do not make me a loser.

Maybe try winning the lottery or finding a genie in a bottle.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: riskyduck24 on February 07, 2023, 10:58:38 AMOnly Shashan and Tryninga are true Gs for got the joke. I have not yet received confirmation whether the payment was received or not and also whether the loan has been defaulted or not. I think you and I both are losers as we both sent dollars. Though I think I sent it faster than you and the figure is also higher than yours. So, I am anxious.
